History
=======

0.7.0 (2019-10-03)
------------------

* ``rows`` no longer required in BAI2 models (c.f. issue 12 and PR 13)

------------------

* Fix regular expression escaping
* Add python 3.7 testing

0.5.0 (2018-03-05)
------------------

* Updated packaging details and improved python version compatibility
